meanings.sent1: The noters in class always have colorful pens.
meanings.sent2: The noters in the meeting wrote down all the important points.
meanings.sent3: The noters at the lecture had a race to see who could write the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a noters, capturing every detail like a detective.
meanings.sent5: The noters in the library had notebooks filled with knowledge.

meanings.definition: A device used for taking notes.
meanings.sent1: The noters on his desk had a sleek design.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her noters to every meeting.
meanings.sent3: The noters beeped whenever a new note was saved.
meanings.sent4: His noters was like a trusty companion, always ready to jot down ideas.
meanings.sent5: The noters had different colored tabs for easy organization.

meanings.definition: To make a brief record of something.
meanings.sent1: She noters important dates in her calendar.
meanings.sent2: He noters down his thoughts before they slip away.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel noters where it hides its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The photographer noters the beauty of nature in every shot.
meanings.sent5: He noters the lyrics of his favorite songs to remember them better.
